home.notification: We are accepting project proposals until September 1, 2024. <guidelines>Submit proposal now</guidelines>.
home.heroText: Propose a project for a green space. Ideas with the most votes will get funding.

eligibleProjects.title: Eligible Projects
eligibleProjects.canSmall: Small area with a few trees

fundsAllocated.title: How are funds allocated?
fundsAllocated.votingMechanism: A new voting mechanism is used, called Quadratic Funding. The project with most donations will get the most funding from the City.
fundsAllocated.allowsAnyone: It allows anyone to vote by donating money to their favourite projects. With every donation, funding is given to project fromthe matching pool.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.zazelenimoAnswer1: Zazelenimo is an online application for the implementation of participatory budgeting programs in cities.
faq.zazelenimoAnswer2: The special feature of Zazelenimo, compared to other applications that have the same purpose, is the use of Ethereum and a special form of voting called square funding.
faq.participatoryAnswer1: Participatory budgeting is a form of involving citizens in deciding on the distribution of budget funds of public authorities.
faq.participatoryAnswer2: PB most often implies that citizens propose and then vote on proposals for communal and other types of projects that will be implemented in the local community from the joint budget.
faq.ethereumAnswer: Ethereum is a decentralized blockchain platform that enables the creation of smart contracts and decentralized applications (dApps). In the Zazelenimo application, it is used to ensure the transparency and security of voting and funding. Every transaction and vote is recorded on the blockchain, which enables a clear and secure overview of all activities.
faq.quadraticAnswer: Quadratic funding is an innovative voting and funding system where the strength of each vote depends on the number of supporters, not the size of an individual donation. This means that projects that get more support with smaller amounts from more citizens have a better chance of getting funding than projects that depend on large donations from a small number of people. The goal is to enable a more equal and fair financing system.
faq.participateAnswer: Anyone can propose a project, participate in the elaboration of any proposal and vote for the proposals that are offered for voting.
faq.participateZazelenimo: How do I participate in Zazelenimo?
faq.participateZazelenimoAnswer: On these pages, you can get information about how Zazelenimo works and how you can use it. In addition, you can use Zazelenimo in the following ways:
faq.participateZazelenimoList1: Proposal. If you want to make an intervention proposal, you can do so by filling out the Proposal Form.
faq.participateZazelenimoList2: Discussion. If you want to participate in the development of your own or other people's proposals, you can do so on the Forum, within the category Projects. Learn more about how to participate in the discussion on the Discussion page.
faq.participateZazelenimoList3: Voting. If you want to vote for the proposals, you can do so through the Zazelenimo application available on the page zazelenimo.hr. Learn more about how to participate in the debate on the Voting page.
faq.participateZazelenimoList4: Management. If you want to participate in the management of the Zazelenimo application and the entire project. You can do that on the Forum, within the Management category. Learn more about how to participate in the discussion on the Management page.
faq.participateNeed: What do I need to participate in Zazelenimo?
faq.participateNeedAnswer: It is enough to have a smartphone or a computer. Your user data will be saved on your device. That's why it's important not to lose access to your device.
faq.cost: How much does proposing projects cost?
faq.costAnswer: It's free. Anyone can propose a project, and if it is useful enough to the citizens, they will reward it with donations.
faq.observe: Can I just watch Let's Go Green without actively participating?
faq.observeAnswer: Of course. Public discussion of proposals is visible on the Forum even without registration. While voting is in progress, you can see at any time how many donations each project received.

homeAbout.title: About the project
homeAbout.firstParagraph: This project is pilot of Muqa - Municipal Quadratic Funding Initiative. It is based on the technology of Ethereum and idea of Quadratic funding.
homeAbout.secondParagraph: Development of our application is funded by Ethereum Foundation. Learn more about Muqa here.

cart.emptyCartDescription: Add some projects to your cart to proceed with the donation.
cart.finalSubmission: This submission is final. Once you submit your ballot, you won't be able to change it.
cart.donationSuccess: Your donation has been successfully received!
cart.resultAvailable: Results will be available after tallying on

proposalForm.title: Send your proposal
proposalForm.description: Propose an investment in the green area of the city of Split.
proposalForm.contactDescription: Your contact information will not be published.
proposalForm.projectDesc: Mention the type of intervention and location in a few words.
proposalForm.projectError: Enter the name of your proposal. Minimum 10 characters.
proposalForm.disctrictDesc: Please indicate the district in which the proposal will be implemented.
proposalForm.streetDesc: Specify the exact or approximate street with regard to where the proposal will be implemented.
proposalForm.streetError: Enter the street or approximate location of the project.
proposalForm.locationDesc: Describe the location of proposed intervention.
proposalForm.locationPlaceholder: Side of the road on Dubrovačka street, from the tunnel to Poljička street...
proposalForm.locationError: Write a little more about the location.
proposalForm.descriptionDesc: What should be done? Why is that important? Why that location? Who all will benefit from this project?
proposalForm.descriptionPlaceholder: Plant tall trees between existing small Oleander trees planted in this strip. Tall trees will provide needed shade for pedestrians, make the air cleaner and cooler, especially in the summer, and shield the entrance of the tunnel from the winds, while shielding the buildings from the noise from the tunnel.
proposalForm.descriptionError: Write a little more about your project proposal.
proposalForm.nameDesc: Enter your first and last name.
proposalForm.proposerDesc: Provide the name of the individual citizen, group of citizens, or an organisation making the proposal. If you want to remain publicly unidentified, you can use a nickname.
proposalForm.proposerError: Enter your name or organization name.
proposalForm.publishTitle: Do I want you to publish my name with the proposal
proposalForm.publishDesc: Leave it blank if you do not want your name as the proposer to appear in the public announcement of the proposal on the forum.
proposalForm.emailDesc: The main way of communication. When we receive your proposal, we will contact you for clarifications and more.
proposalForm.emailError: You have entered an invalid email address
proposalForm.mobileDesc: In case we cannot reach you via email, leave a number so we can call you.
proposalForm.mobileError: You have entered an incorrect mobile phone number
proposalForm.futherTitle: I want to participate in the further elaboration of the proposal
proposalForm.futherDesc: We will check your proposal and publish it on the Zazelenimo Split Forum (forum.zazelenimo.com). There you can join the discussion about the proposal.
proposalForm.futherError: Confirm whether or not you want to participate in the further elaboration of the proposal
proposalForm.additionalDesc: If you have additional documents, links or information to support your proposal, please include them here.
proposalForm.formFooterDesc1: <guidelines>Notice:</guidelines> By submitting a proposal, you confirm that all information provided is true and correct to the best of your knowledge.
proposalForm.formFooterDesc2: Please make your proposal thorough and clear. If you have any questions or need help, please feel free to contact the program coordinators.
proposalForm.fotoDesc: You can attach more photos. Make sure that the surfaces on which the intervention is proposed are clearly visible in the photographs.
proposalForm.notification: There are errors in the form. Please check and correct them.
proposalForm.proposalLastData: This proposal is currently under review. At this stage, only members of our expert team can comment on proposals. Once the proposal has been reviewed and meets all the criteria, it will be published publicly on the Forum and opened for comments. Please register and follow this topic to stay informed about the next steps.
proposalForm.success: Your proposal has been successfully submitted and you will now be redirected to the proposal topic on our Forum.
proposalForm.successDesc: You currently cannot comment on the proposal as it is under review by our expert team. We will notify you when the public discussion is open.
proposalForm.termsTitle: I accept the terms of use of Zazelenimo
proposalForm.termsError: Confirm that you accept the terms of use of Zazelenimo
proposalForm.privacyTitle: I accept the terms of use of Zazelenimo
proposalForm.privacyError: Confirm that you accept the privacy policy of Zazelenimo
proposalForm.allowTitle: I allow Zazelenimo to contact me and inform me about my proposal
proposalForm.allowError: Confirm that you accept that Zazelenimo contacts and informs you about your proposal
proposalForm.accept: I accept the <link1>Terms of Use</link1> and <link2>Privacy Policy</link2>
proposalForm.acceptError: Confirm that you accept the terms of use and privacy policy of Zazelenimo

proposalMail.subject: Your proposal has been successfully received!
proposalMail.messagePart2: Thank you for submitting your proposal for Zazelenimo Split. Your proposal has been successfully received and is currently under review by our expert team.
proposalMail.messagePart3: You can view your proposal and track its progress at the following link: <link>Link to proposal</link>
proposalMail.messagePart4: Please note that you will not be able to comment on the proposal at this stage. Once the proposal has been reviewed and meets all the conditions, it will be made public and opened for discussion. We recommend that you register on our Forum and follow the topic to receive notifications on the next steps.
proposalMail.messagePart5: If you have any questions, feel free to contact us.
